Overview For gstRigidBody Members Chapter

gstRigidBody

gstRigidBody( ) ;

Constructor.

~gstRigidBody

~gstRigidBody( ) ;

Destructor.

getTypeId

virtual gstType getTypeId( ) const;

Virtual form of getClassTypeId.

isOfType

virtual gstBoolean isOfType( gstType type ) const;

Virtual form of staticIsOfType.

setGravity

void setGravity( gstVector& newGravity ) ;

Set gravity (acceleration) [mm/sec^2]. Gravity is in world coordinates Default is 0.0,0.0,0.0.

updateDynamics

virtual void updateDynamics( ) ;

For extension: Used by system or for creating sub-classes only. When body has velocity or a force, this method does Euler integration of rigid body state state.

getClassTypeId

static gstType getClassTypeId( ) ;

Static: get type id of this class.

staticIsOfType

static gstBoolean staticIsOfType( gstType type ) ;

Return TRUE if class is of the given type or is derived from that type.
